plot: Between disappearance and memory, recollection and history, the departure narrative unfolds, imbued with the desire to return, the hope of somewhere else, real or imagined.
title: Doucement... repartir
plot_es: Between disappearance and memory, recollection and history, the departure narrative unfolds, imbued with the desire to return, the hope of somewhere else, real or imagined.
plot_en: Between disappearance and memory, recollection and history, the departure narrative unfolds, imbued with the desire to return, the hope of somewhere else, real or imagined.
